section.marginalnote: When notice to mediate must be delivered
section.sectiontext: Unless the court otherwise orders, a Notice to Mediate may be delivered under section 3 no earlier than 90 days after the filing of the first statement of defence in the family law proceeding and no later than 90 days before the date of trial.

section.marginalnote: When notice to mediate must be served or delivered
section.sectiontext: Unless the court otherwise orders, a Notice to Mediate may be served or delivered under section 3 no earlier than 90 days after the filing of the first response to family claim in the family law case and no later than 90 days before the date of trial.
